title: 18,822 Indian nationals deported by US since 2009, says Jaishankar in Rajya Sabha
description: The US has deported 18,822 Indian nationals since 2009, with 3,258 in early 2025. External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar informed the Rajya Sabha that states and the NIA are investigating human trafficking, with Punjab reporting the most cases. The MEA is eng…
content: As many as 18,822 Indian nationals have been deported by the United States since 2009, including 3,258 individuals since January 2025, the government informed the Rajya Sabha on Thursday.External Aff… [+4787 chars]
